subject: Your loan application is waiting
body:
Dear Homeowner 

Are you still paying too much mortgage interest?  Refinance us better rate.  Your approval is waiting.

You can receive $254,000 for
$679 per month save 38%.

Please submit Right Away.
http://ilook.tw/malg8

Jonah Navarro
21 Century Refinance


"Nobody has ever before asked the nuclear family to live all by itself in a box the way we do. With no relatives, no support, we've put it in an impossible situation." -- Margaret Mead
